StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DeleteCandidateWaiver]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CandidateWaiverID int, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
DECLARE @DBID INT DECLARE @DBNAME NVARCHAR(128)
SET @DBID = DB_ID() SET @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER WHERE CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID = @CandidateWaiverID) BEGIN --- DELETE THE CANDIDATE PROGRAM CRITERIA WAIVER RECORD DELETE FROM CANDIDATE_PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER WHERE CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID = @CandidateWaiverID END
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN RAISERROR ('An error occurred dele.ng the Candidate Program Criteria Waivers', 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_WAIVER WHERE CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID = @CandidateWaiverID) BEGIN --- DELETE THE CANDIDATE CRITERIA WAIVER RECORD EXEC sp_DeleteCandidateCriteriaWaiver @CandidateWaiverID END
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN RAISERROR ('An error occurred dele.ng the Candidate Criteria Waiver', 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- UPDATE THE USER_LOGIN BEFORE DELETING THE RECORD IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_WAIVER WHERE CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID = @CandidateWaiverID) BEGIN UPDATE CANDIDATE_WAIVER SET USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin WHERE CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID = @CandidateWaiverID END
--- DELETE THE RECORD DELETE FROM CANDIDATE_WAIVER WHERE CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID = @CandidateWaiverID
